changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE wallet_operations ( id UUID PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT gen_random_uuid(), wallet_operation_type wallet_operation_type, amount NUMERIC(19, 2), wallet_operation_reason wallet_operation_reason, created_at TIMESTAMP, wallet_id UUID NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT fk_wallet_operations_wallet FOREIGN KEY (wallet_id) REFERENCES wallets (id) ON DELETE CASCADE );
